Yandex Disk.name: F03b.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose what types of advertising content it does not permit?

Yandex Disk.name: F03b.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose whether it requires all advertising content be clearly labelled as such?

Yandex Disk.name: F03b.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose the processes and technologies it uses to identify advertising content or accounts that violate the company’s rules?
